== The Core API ==
The core API is, as the name implies, the core of the API. This includes converting
the decimal floating point string into its binary counterpart, verifying that said string
is a valid floating point number

=== Format ===
Format is the most visible component of the API.
The job of Format is to take a given decimal floating point value and convert it to binary.
